verses.verse: Then <S%G2532><s%> came together <S%G4863><s%> <S%G5743><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> the P'rushim <S%G5330><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> of the scribes <S%G1122><s%>, which came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5631><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Yerushalayim <S%G2414><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when they saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5631><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> <S%G5723><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> with defiled <S%G2839><s%>, that is to say <S%G5123><s%> <S%G5748><s%>, with unwashen <S%G449><s%>, hands <S%G5495><s%>, they found fault <S%G3201><s%> <S%G5662><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the P'rushim <S%G5330><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%>, except <S%G3362><s%> they wash <S%G3538><s%> <S%G5672><s%> their hands <S%G5495><s%> oft <S%G4435><s%>, eat <S%G2068><s%> <S%G5719><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>, holding <S%G2902><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the tradition <S%G3862><s%> of the elders <S%G4245><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when they come from <S%G575><s%> the market <S%G58><s%>, except <S%G3362><s%> they wash <S%G907><s%> <S%G5672><s%>, they eat <S%G2068><s%> <S%G5719><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> other things <S%G243><s%> there be <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> they have received <S%G3880><s%> <S%G5627><s%> to hold <S%G2902><s%> <S%G5721><s%>, as the washing <S%G909><s%> of cups <S%G4221><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> pots <S%G3582><s%>, <S%G2532><s%> brasen vessels <S%G5473><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of tables <S%G2825><s%>.

Then <S%G1899><s%> the P'rushim <S%G5330><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> scribes <S%G1122><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> <S%G5719><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, Why <S%G1302><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%> <S%G5719><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the tradition <S%G3862><s%> of the elders <S%G4245><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> <S%G5719><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> with unwashen <S%G449><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%>?

He answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5679><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, <S%G3754><s%> Well <S%G2573><s%> hath Esaias <S%G2268><s%> prophesied <S%G4395><s%> <S%G5656><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> hypocrites <S%G5273><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5769><s%>, This <S%G3778><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> honoureth <S%G5091><s%> <S%G5719><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> with their lips <S%G5491><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> their <S%G846><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> is <S%G568><s%> <S%G5719><s%> far <S%G4206><s%> from <S%G575><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>.

Howbeit <S%G1161><s%> in vain <S%G3155><s%> do they worship <S%G4576><s%> <S%G5736><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>, teaching <S%G1321><s%> <S%G5723><s%> for doctrines <S%G1319><s%> the Mitzvot <S%G1778><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> laying aside <S%G863><s%> <S%G5631><s%> the Mitzvah <S%G1785><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, ye hold <S%G2902><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the tradition <S%G3862><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>, as the washing <S%G909><s%> of pots <S%G3582><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> cups <S%G4221><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> other <S%G243><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> like things <S%G3946><s%> ye do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5719><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5707><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Full well <S%G2573><s%> ye reject <S%G114><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the Mitzvah <S%G1785><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> ye may keep <S%G5083><s%> <S%G5661><s%> your own <S%G5216><s%> tradition <S%G3862><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> Mosheh <S%G3475><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, Honour <S%G5091><s%> <S%G5720><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%>, Whoso curseht <S%G2551><s%> <S%G5723><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%>, let him die <S%G5053><s%> <S%G5720><s%> the death <S%G2288><s%>:

But <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, If <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> shall say <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5632><s%> to his father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%>, It is Corban <S%G2878><s%>, that is to say <S%G3603><s%>, a gift <S%G1435><s%>, by <S%G1537><s%> whatsoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> thou mightest be profited by <S%G5623><s%> <S%G5686><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>; he shall be free.

And <S%G2532><s%> ye suffer <S%G863><s%> <S%G5719><s%> him <S%G846><s%> no more <S%G3765><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5658><s%> ought <S%G3762><s%> for his <S%G846><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%>;

Making <S%G208><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> of none effect <S%G208><s%> <S%G5723><s%> through your <S%G5216><s%> tradition <S%G3862><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> ye have delivered <S%G3860><s%> <S%G5656><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> like things <S%G3946><s%> do ye <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5719><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had called <S%G4341><s%> <S%G5666><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%> unto him, he said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5707><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Hearken <S%G191><s%> <S%G5720><s%> unto me <S%G3450><s%> every one <S%G3956><s%> of you, and <S%G2532><s%> understand <S%G4920><s%> <S%G5720><s%>:

There is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> from without <S%G1855><s%> a man <S%G444><s%>, that <S%G3739><s%> entering <S%G1531><s%> <S%G5740><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5736><s%> defile <S%G2840><s%> <S%G5658><s%> him <S%G846><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> the things which come <S%G1607><s%> <S%G5740><s%> out of <S%G575><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, those <S%G1565><s%> are they <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> that defile <S%G2840><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the man <S%G444><s%>.
If any man <S%G1536><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> ears <S%G3775><s%> to hear <S%G191><s%> <S%G5721><s%>, let him hear <S%G191><s%> <S%G5720><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he was entered <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5627><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%>, his <S%G846><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> <S%G5707><s%> him <S%G846><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> the parable <S%G3850><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Are <S%G2075><s%> <S%G5748><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> without understanding <S%G801><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>? Do ye <S%G3539><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> perceive <S%G3539><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> whatsoever thing <S%G3956><s%> from without <S%G1855><s%> entereth <S%G1531><s%> <S%G5740><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the man <S%G444><s%>, it cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5736><s%> defile <S%G2840><s%> <S%G5658><s%> him <S%G846><s%>;

Because <S%G3754><s%> it entereth <S%G1531><s%> <S%G5736><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the belly <S%G2836><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> goeth out <S%G1607><s%> <S%G5736><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the draught <S%G856><s%>, purging <S%G2511><s%> <S%G5723><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> meats <S%G1033><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5707><s%>, <S%G3754><s%> That which cometh <S%G1607><s%> <S%G5740><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the man <S%G444><s%>, that <S%G1565><s%> defileth <S%G2840><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the man <S%G444><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> from within <S%G2081><s%>, out of <S%G1537><s%> the heart <S%G2588><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>, proceed <S%G1607><s%> <S%G5736><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> thoughts <S%G1261><s%>, adulteries <S%G3430><s%>, fornications <S%G4202><s%>, murders <S%G5408><s%>,

Thefts <S%G2829><s%>, covetousness <S%G4124><s%>, wickedness <S%G4189><s%>, deceit <S%G1388><s%>, lasciviousness <S%G766><s%>, an evil <S%G4190><s%> eye <S%G3788><s%>, blasphemy <S%G988><s%>, pride <S%G5243><s%>, foolishness <S%G877><s%>:
All <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> evil things <S%G4190><s%> come <S%G1607><s%> <S%G5736><s%> from within <S%G2081><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> defile <S%G2840><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the man <S%G444><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> from thence <S%G1564><s%> he arose <S%G450><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, and went <S%G565><s%> <S%G5627><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the borders <S%G3181><s%> of TZor <S%G5184><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> TZidon <S%G4605><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5631><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> an house <S%G3614><s%>, and would have <S%G2309><s%> <S%G5707><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5629><s%> it: but <S%G2532><s%> he could <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5675><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be hid <S%G2990><s%> <S%G5629><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> a certain woman <S%G1135><s%>, whose <S%G3739><s%> <S%G846><s%> young daughter <S%G2365><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5707><s%> an unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%>, heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5660><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5631><s%> and fell <S%G4363><s%> <S%G5627><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> his <S%G846><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%>:

<S%G1161><s%> The woman <S%G1135><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> a Greek <S%G1674><s%>, a Syrophenician <S%G4949><s%> by nation <S%G1085><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> she besought <S%G2065><s%> <S%G5707><s%> him <S%G846><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he would cast forth <S%G1544><s%> <S%G5725><s%> the devil <S%G1140><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> her <S%G846><s%> daughter <S%G2364><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto her <S%G846><s%>, Let <S%G863><s%> <S%G5628><s%> the children <S%G5043><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> be filled <S%G5526><s%> <S%G5683><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> meet <S%G2570><s%> to take <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5629><s%> the children's <S%G5043><s%> bread <S%G740><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to cast <S%G906><s%> <S%G5629><s%> it unto the dogs <S%G2952><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> she answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5662><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Yes <S%G3483><s%>, YY <S%G2962><s%>: yet <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1063><s%> the dogs <S%G2952><s%> under <S%G5270><s%> the table <S%G5132><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> <S%G5719><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the children's <S%G3813><s%> crumbs <S%G5589><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto her <S%G846><s%>, For <S%G1223><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%> go thy way <S%G5217><s%> <S%G5720><s%>; the devil <S%G1140><s%> is gone <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5758><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> daughter <S%G2364><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when she was come <S%G565><s%> <S%G5631><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> her <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3624><s%>, she found <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5627><s%> the devil <S%G1140><s%> gone out <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5761><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> her daughter <S%G2364><s%> laid <S%G906><s%> <S%G5772><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the bed <S%G2825><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> again <S%G3825><s%>, departing <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5631><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the coasts <S%G3725><s%> of TZor <S%G5184><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> TZidon <S%G4605><s%>, he came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> of the Galil <S%G1056><s%>, through <S%G303><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the coasts <S%G3725><s%> of Decapolis <S%G1179><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they bring <S%G5342><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> one that was deaf <S%G2974><s%>, and had an impediment in his speech <S%G3424><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they beseech <S%G3870><s%> <S%G5719><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> put <S%G2007><s%> <S%G5632><s%> his hand <S%G5495><s%> upon him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he took <S%G618><s%> <S%G5642><s%> him <S%G846><s%> aside <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2398><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%>, and put <S%G906><s%> <S%G5627><s%> his <S%G846><s%> fingers <S%G1147><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> ears <S%G3775><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he spit <S%G4429><s%> <S%G5660><s%>, and touched <S%G680><s%> <S%G5662><s%> his <S%G846><s%> tongue <S%G1100><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> looking up <S%G308><s%> <S%G5660><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, he sighed <S%G4727><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Ephphatha <S%G2188><s%>, that is <S%G3603><s%>, Be opened <S%G1272><s%> <S%G5682><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> his <S%G846><s%> ears <S%G189><s%> were opened <S%G1272><s%> <S%G5681><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the string <S%G1199><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> tongue <S%G1100><s%> was loosed <S%G3089><s%> <S%G5681><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he spake <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5707><s%> plain <S%G3723><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he charged <S%G1291><s%> <S%G5668><s%> them <S%G846><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they should tell <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5632><s%> no man <S%G3367><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> the more <S%G3745><s%> he <S%G846><s%> charged <S%G1291><s%> <S%G5710><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, so much the more <S%G3123><s%> a great deal <S%G4054><s%> they published <S%G2784><s%> <S%G5707><s%> it;

And <S%G2532><s%> were beyond measure <S%G5249><s%> astonished <S%G1605><s%> <S%G5712><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, He hath done <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5758><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> well <S%G2573><s%>: he maketh <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5719><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> the deaf <S%G2974><s%> to hear <S%G191><s%> <S%G5721><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the dumb <S%G216><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5721><s%>.
